excerpt: This sandwich recipe is a healthy and vegetarian alternative to the traditional tuna salad sandwich. The chickpea salad is high in protein and fiber, with a delicious blend of flavors and texture.

ingredients.name: Mayonnaise
ingredients.notes: use vegan mayonnaise for a vegan option

ingredients.name: Bread slices
ingredients.notes: use whole wheat bread for a healthier option

instructions.name: Make the Chickpea Salad
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine the chickpeas, red bell pepper, red onion, celery, and parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, salt, and black pepper.
Pour the dressing over the chickpea mixture and stir well to combine.

instructions.name: Assemble the Sandwich
instructions: Toast the bread slices if desired.
Place a lettuce leaf on each slice of bread.
Divide the chickpea salad between two slices of bread.
Top with sliced avocado and remaining bread slices.
Cut the sandwiches in half and serve immediately.
